statements: SELECT * FROM waste_management_policy;
SELECT waste_id, waste_type FROM waste_management_policy WHERE government_agency='ABC Agency';
SELECT AVG(waste_quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM waste_management_policy;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_waste_count FROM waste_management_policy WHERE waste_type='Plastic';
SELECT DISTINCT government_agency FROM waste_management_policy;
SELECT MAX(waste_quantity) AS max_quantity FROM waste_management_policy;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_policy WHERE waste_quantity > 100;
SELECT waste_id, government_agency FROM waste_management_policy WHERE waste_type='Paper';
SELECT MIN(waste_quantity) AS min_quantity FROM waste_management_policy;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_policy ORDER BY waste_quantity DESC;
SELECT AVG(waste_quantity) AS avg_quantity_per_type, waste_type FROM waste_management_policy GROUP BY waste_type;
SELECT waste_id, waste_quantity FROM waste_management_policy WHERE government_agency='XYZ Agency' AND waste_quantity < 50;
SELECT government_agency, COUNT(*) AS waste_count FROM waste_management_policy GROUP BY government_agency;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_policy WHERE waste_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT waste_type, SUM(waste_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM waste_management_policy GROUP BY waste_type;
SELECT waste_type, AVG(waste_quantity) AS avg_quantity_per_type_having_more_than_100 FROM waste_management_policy GROUP BY waste_type HAVING AVG(waste_quantity) > 100;
SELECT government_agency, MAX(waste_quantity) AS max_quantity FROM waste_management_policy GROUP BY government_agency;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_policy WHERE waste_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9);
SELECT waste_type, COUNT(*) AS waste_count FROM waste_management_policy WHERE waste_quantity > 200 GROUP BY waste_type;
SELECT government_agency, AVG(waste_quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM waste_management_policy WHERE waste_type='Metal' GROUP BY government_agency;
SELECT waste_id, waste_type, waste_quantity, government_agency FROM waste_management_policy WHERE government_agency = 'Environment Agency';
SELECT * FROM waste_management_policy WHERE waste_quantity > 1000;
SELECT waste_type, SUM(waste_quantity) as total_quantity FROM waste_management_policy GROUP BY waste_type;
SELECT waste_id, government_agency FROM waste_management_policy WHERE waste_type LIKE '%plastic%' ORDER BY waste_id DESC;
SELECT waste_type, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM waste_management_policy GROUP BY waste_type HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT government_agency, AVG(waste_quantity) as average_quantity FROM waste_management_policy GROUP BY government_agency;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_policy WHERE government_agency IN ('Environmental Protection Agency', 'Waste Management Department');
SELECT waste_id, waste_type FROM waste_management_policy WHERE waste_quantity BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT government_agency, MAX(waste_quantity) as max_quantity FROM waste_management_policy GROUP BY government_agency;
SELECT waste_id, waste_type FROM waste_management_policy WHERE government_agency LIKE '%Department' ORDER BY waste_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_records FROM waste_management_policy;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_policy WHERE waste_type = 'Recyclable' AND government_agency = 'Recycling Center';
SELECT waste_type, waste_quantity FROM waste_management_policy WHERE waste_quantity > (SELECT AVG(waste_quantity) FROM waste_management_policy);
SELECT DISTINCT government_agency FROM waste_management_policy;
SELECT waste_id, waste_type FROM waste_management_policy WHERE waste_quantity < (SELECT AVG(waste_quantity) FROM waste_management_policy) ORDER BY waste_quantity DESC;
SELECT government_agency, SUM(waste_quantity) as total_quantity FROM waste_management_policy GROUP BY government_agency HAVING total_quantity > 5000;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_policy WHERE waste_type NOT LIKE '%Hazardous%' AND waste_quantity < 500;
SELECT waste_id, waste_type, waste_quantity FROM waste_management_policy WHERE waste_quantity = (SELECT MAX(waste_quantity) FROM waste_management_policy);
SELECT government_agency, COUNT(*) as total_records FROM waste_management_policy GROUP BY government_agency HAVING total_records > 2;
SELECT waste_type, AVG(waste_quantity) as average_quantity FROM waste_management_policy GROUP BY waste_type ORDER BY average_quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM agencies;
SELECT name, contact_person FROM agencies;
SELECT * FROM waste_management;
SELECT waste_type, location FROM waste_management;
SELECT name, email FROM agencies WHERE agency_id = 'a1';
SELECT * FROM agencies WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM waste_management WHERE collected_by = 'John';
SELECT agency_id, name, contact_person FROM agencies;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM agencies;
SELECT MAX(bin_id) FROM waste_management;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM waste_management;
SELECT name, email FROM agencies WHERE name = 'Agency X';
SELECT bin_id, waste_type, location FROM waste_management WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT agency_id, name, email FROM agencies WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT AVG(bin_id) FROM waste_management;
SELECT agency_id, name, contact_person, email FROM agencies WHERE contact_person = 'Jane Doe';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT collected_by) FROM waste_management;
SELECT bin_id, collected_by FROM waste_management WHERE location = 'Main Street';
SELECT AVG(bin_id) AS average_bin_id FROM waste_management;
SELECT name, email FROM agencies WHERE agency_id IN ('a1', 'a2');
SELECT * FROM agencies WHERE name = 'ABC Corporation';
SELECT agency_id, name, contact_person FROM agencies WHERE agency_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM waste_management WHERE location LIKE '%City';
SELECT bin_id, waste_type FROM waste_management WHERE collected_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT DISTINCT waste_type FROM waste_management;
SELECT agency_id, name, email FROM agencies WHERE contact_person = 'Jane Smith' AND email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT agency_id, name, contact_person, email FROM agencies WHERE agency_id IN (SELECT agency_id FROM waste_management WHERE location = 'Street');
SELECT agency_id, name, contact_person FROM agencies WHERE agency_id NOT IN (SELECT agency_id FROM waste_management);
SELECT MAX(bin_id) AS max_bin_id FROM waste_management;
SELECT AVG(bin_id) AS avg_bin_id FROM waste_management;
SELECT agency_id, COUNT(*) AS waste_count FROM waste_management GROUP BY agency_id;
SELECT agency_id, name, COUNT(*) AS waste_count FROM agencies INNER JOIN waste_management ON agencies.agency_id = waste_management.agency_id GROUP BY agency_id;
SELECT agency_id, name, COUNT(*) AS waste_count FROM agencies LEFT JOIN waste_management ON agencies.agency_id = waste_management.agency_id GROUP BY agency_id;
SELECT agency_id, name, COUNT(*) AS waste_count FROM agencies RIGHT JOIN waste_management ON agencies.agency_id = waste_management.agency_id GROUP BY agency_id;
SELECT a.agency_id, a.name, COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) AS waste_count FROM agencies a LEFT JOIN waste_management w ON a.agency_id = w.agency_id GROUP BY a.agency_id;
SELECT agency_id, name, COALESCE(SUM(bin_id), 0) AS total_bin_id FROM agencies LEFT JOIN waste_management ON agencies.agency_id = waste_management.agency_id GROUP BY agency_id;
SELECT agency_id, name, CASE WHEN contact_person IS NULL THEN 'No Contact Person' ELSE contact_person END AS contact_status FROM agencies;
SELECT agency_id, name, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AS current_date FROM agencies;
SELECT agency_id, name, SUBSTRING(email, 1, 5) AS email_prefix FROM agencies;
SELECT agency_id, name, CONCAT(contact_person, ' (', email, ')') AS contact_info FROM agencies;
SELECT agency_id, name, CONCAT('Waste Type: ', waste_type, ', Location: ', location) AS waste_details FROM waste_management;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, contact_person FROM government_agencies;
SELECT DISTINCT agency_name FROM government_agencies;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection;
SELECT waste_type, quantity FROM waste_collection;
SELECT * FROM policy_improvement;
SELECT policy_name, implementation_date FROM policy_improvement;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM policy_improvement WHERE responsible_agency = 2;
SELECT agency_name, contact_email FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_id = 3;
SELECT policy_name, implementation_date FROM policy_improvement WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT agency_name, contact_person FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_name = 'Environmental Agency';
SELECT * FROM policy_improvement WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM government_agencies;
SELECT AVG(quantity) FROM waste_collection;
SELECT MAX(implementation_date) FROM policy_improvement;
SELECT agency_name, contact_email FROM government_agencies ORDER BY agency_name ASC;
SELECT policy_name, responsible_agency FROM policy_improvement ORDER BY responsible_agency DESC;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_name = 'Department of Health';
SELECT agency_name, contact_person FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(quantity) FROM waste_collection WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM government_agencies INNER JOIN waste_collection ON government_agencies.agency_id = waste_collection.collection_id;

SELECT government_agencies.agency_name, waste_collection.quantity FROM government_agencies INNER JOIN waste_collection ON government_agencies.agency_id = waste_collection.collection_id WHERE waste_collection.waste_type = 'Paper';
SELECT policy_name, implementation_date FROM policy_improvement WHERE responsible_agency = 2;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_id IN (SELECT responsible_agency FROM policy_improvement);
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM policy_improvement WHERE government_agencies.agency_id = policy_improvement.responsible_agency);

SELECT agency_name, COUNT(*) AS collection_count FROM government_agencies INNER JOIN waste_collection ON government_agencies.agency_id = waste_collection.collection_id GROUP BY agency_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE LENGTH(contact_email) > 10;
SELECT * FROM policy_improvement ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(quantity) FROM waste_collection;
SELECT agency_name, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM government_agencies INNER JOIN waste_collection ON government_agencies.agency_id = waste_collection.collection_id GROUP BY agency_name;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_id = 1 AND agency_name = 'Department of Environment';
SELECT MAX(implementation_date) FROM policy_improvement;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_id = 1 UNION SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_id = 2;
SELECT policy_name, responsible_agency, agency_name FROM policy_improvement INNER JOIN government_agencies ON policy_improvement.responsible_agency = government_agencies.agency_id;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies;
SELECT agency_id, agency_name FROM government_agencies;
SELECT * FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT * FROM waste_data;
SELECT data_id, facility_id, date, waste_type FROM waste_data;
SELECT * FROM collaboration;
SELECT collaboration_id, agency_id, facility_id FROM collaboration;
SELECT agency_id, COUNT(*) AS num_collaborations FROM collaboration GROUP BY agency_id;
SELECT facility_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM waste_data GROUP BY facility_id;
SELECT waste_type, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM waste_data GROUP BY waste_type;
SELECT DISTINCT facility_id FROM waste_data;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_name LIKE 'Gov%';
SELECT * FROM waste_facilities WHERE location = 'CityA';
SELECT * FROM waste_data WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies JOIN collaboration ON government_agencies.agency_id = collaboration.agency_id;
SELECT * FROM waste_facilities LEFT JOIN waste_data ON waste_facilities.facility_id = waste_data.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM waste_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT MAX(capacity) AS max_capacity FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM waste_data;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies;
SELECT agency_id, agency_name FROM government_agencies;
SELECT * FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT * FROM waste_data;
SELECT data_id, facility_id, date, waste_type FROM waste_data;
SELECT * FROM collaboration;
SELECT collaboration_id, agency_id, facility_id FROM collaboration;
SELECT agency_id, COUNT(*) AS facility_count FROM collaboration GROUP BY agency_id;

SELECT agency_name, facility_name, location FROM government_agencies JOIN collaboration ON government_agencies.agency_id = collaboration.agency_id JOIN waste_facilities ON collaboration.facility_id = waste_facilities.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM waste_facilities WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT agency_name, COUNT(*) AS collab_count FROM government_agencies LEFT JOIN collaboration ON government_agencies.agency_id = collaboration.agency_id GROUP BY agency_name;
SELECT * FROM collaboration WHERE collaboration_type = 'Partnership';
SELECT agency_id, facility_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_waste FROM collaboration JOIN waste_data ON collaboration.facility_id = waste_data.facility_id GROUP BY agency_id, facility_id;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_name LIKE '%environment%';
SELECT * FROM waste_facilities WHERE location LIKE '%City';

SELECT agency_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_waste FROM government_agencies JOIN collaboration ON government_agencies.agency_id = collaboration.agency_id JOIN waste_data ON collaboration.facility_id = waste_data.facility_id GROUP BY agency_name;
SELECT * FROM waste_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT agency_name, COUNT(DISTINCT facility_id) AS unique_facilities FROM government_agencies JOIN collaboration ON government_agencies.agency_id = collaboration.agency_id GROUP BY agency_name;
SELECT * FROM collaboration WHERE agency_id IN (SELECT agency_id FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_name = 'Environmental Protection Agency');
SELECT * FROM Agency;
SELECT agency_name, contact_person FROM Agency;
SELECT official_name, official_title FROM Government_Official;
SELECT * FROM Data_Sharing;
SELECT data_shared, share_date FROM Data_Sharing;
SELECT * FROM Waste_Management;
SELECT waste_type, collection_point, collection_date FROM Waste_Management;
SELECT * FROM Policy;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM Policy;
SELECT a.agency_name, go.official_name, ds.data_shared FROM Agency a JOIN Government_Official go ON a.agency_id = go.agency_id JOIN Data_Sharing ds ON go.official_id = ds.official_id;
SELECT p.policy_name, p.effective_date, wm.waste_type FROM Policy p JOIN Waste_Management wm ON p.policy_id = wm.waste_id;
SELECT a.agency_name, go.official_name, wm.collection_date FROM Agency a JOIN Government_Official go ON a.agency_id = go.agency_id JOIN Waste_Management wm ON go.official_id = wm.waste_id;
SELECT a.agency_name, p.policy_description, ds.data_shared FROM Agency a JOIN Policy p ON a.agency_id = p.policy_id JOIN Data_Sharing ds ON p.policy_id = ds.official_id;
SELECT go.official_name, wm.waste_type, p.policy_name FROM Government_Official go JOIN Waste_Management wm ON go.official_id = wm.waste_id JOIN Policy p ON wm.waste_id = p.policy_id;
SELECT a.agency_name, p.policy_name, wm.collection_point FROM Agency a JOIN Policy p ON a.agency_id = p.policy_id JOIN Waste_Management wm ON p.policy_id = wm.waste_id;
SELECT p.policy_name, wm.collection_date, ds.data_shared FROM Policy p JOIN Waste_Management wm ON p.policy_id = wm.waste_id JOIN Data_Sharing ds ON wm.waste_id = ds.official_id;
SELECT a.agency_name, go.official_title, p.policy_description FROM Agency a JOIN Government_Official go ON a.agency_id = go.agency_id JOIN Policy p ON go.official_id = p.policy_id;
SELECT wm.waste_type, wm.collection_point, wm.collection_date FROM Waste_Management wm WHERE wm.collection_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT a.agency_name, go.official_name, ds.data_shared FROM Agency a JOIN Government_Official go ON a.agency_id = go.agency_id JOIN Data_Sharing ds ON go.official_id = ds.official_id ORDER BY ds.share_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Agency WHERE agency_id = 1;
SELECT official_name, official_title FROM Government_Official WHERE agency_id = 2;
SELECT policy_name, effective_date FROM Policy WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Agency WHERE agency_id = 1;
SELECT official_name, official_title, agency_name FROM Government_Official GO JOIN Agency A ON GO.agency_id = A.agency_id;
SELECT official_name, data_shared FROM Government_Official GO JOIN Data_Sharing DS ON GO.official_id = DS.official_id;
SELECT * FROM Data_Sharing WHERE share_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Waste_Management WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM Policy WHERE effective_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT agency_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM Agency WHERE agency_name LIKE 'Gov%';
SELECT official_name, data_shared FROM Government_Official WHERE official_title LIKE '%Director%';
SELECT * FROM Agency ORDER BY agency_name DESC;
SELECT waste_type, COUNT(*) AS waste_count FROM Waste_Management GROUP BY waste_type HAVING waste_count > 10;
SELECT official_id, COUNT(*) AS share_count FROM Data_Sharing GROUP BY official_id ORDER BY share_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_name, LENGTH(policy_description) AS description_length FROM Policy;
SELECT agency_name, COUNT(*) AS official_count FROM Agency A JOIN Government_Official GO ON A.agency_id = GO.agency_id GROUP BY agency_name;
SELECT policy_name, DATE_ADD(effective_date, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AS new_effective_date FROM Policy;
SELECT official_title, AVG(official_id) AS avg_official_id FROM Government_Official GROUP BY official_title HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_name FROM Policy;
SELECT agency_name, MAX(agency_id) AS max_id FROM Agency;
SELECT official_name, share_id FROM Government_Official GO JOIN Data_Sharing DS ON GO.official_id = DS.official_id;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM Policy WHERE policy_description LIKE '%environment%';
SELECT MAX(collection_date) AS latest_collection_date FROM Waste_Management;
